body_html:
Thanks for the feedback, Maria. I haven't tested #for_rejection_letter but I assumed it wouldn't work any more: it's quite old, untested, it even has a comment that it probably breaks at a certain point. I just carried it over because I was too lazy to delete it. It's gone now.

I've added the coaches' names in a separate column.

body:
Thanks for the feedback, Maria. I haven't tested `#for_rejection_letter` but I assumed it wouldn't work any more: it's quite old, untested, it even has a comment that it probably breaks at a certain point. I just carried it over because I was too lazy to delete it. It's gone now.

I've added the coaches' names in a separate column.
